full_summary:
**Silverhorn Potable Water System – Banff National Park**
### Request for Proposal: RFP # 5P468-23-0053/A

**Project Overview:**

The Parks Canada Agency (PCA) invites experienced contractors to submit a proposal for the drilling of a water well and construction of a potable water system at the Silverhorn Campground located in Banff National Park.

**Background:**
Current potable water is being hauled to site, but a permanent, consistent source is desired. Following a previous drilling attempt in 2022, PCA has determined that a shallow well under the direct influence of surface water is the most suitable option.

**Objectives:**

* Drill a water well
* Construct a remote, solar-powered treatment facility
* Pour a concrete slab to support the treatment facility
* Supply a potable water storage tank and a greywater storage tank
* Complete all work by June 30, 2023

**Bidding Requirements:**

* Competitive bidding ("merit-based")
* Lowest Price will be the basis for selection
* Eligible bidders must submit their bids via email or fax
* Mandatory site visit on May 4, 2023, at 1:00 PM MDT

**Submission Guidelines:**

* Bidders' emails and faxes will be accepted as official
* Only the specified email address and fax number will be used
* Submissions via SAP Ariba or in person will not be accepted
* Attachments must not exceed 15 MB in size

**Enquiries:**

* Technical and contractual enquiries must be submitted in writing no later than 5 business days before the closing date

**Important Dates:**

* Tender closing date: May 15, 2023, 4:00 PM MDT
* Expected contract start date: May 17, 2023
* Expected contract end date: June 30, 2023

### Documents:

Please visit the CanadaTends website (canadabuys.canada.ca) for the RFP package and any addenda. Submissions based on documents obtained from other sources will be done at the bidder's own risk. Please submit your proposals electronically to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca) or via fax to 1-855-983-1808.
